failure.message:
`cy.task('reportAllureCypressSpecMessages')` failed with the following error:
The 'task' event has not been registered in the setupNodeEvents method. You must register it before using cy.task()
Fix this in your setupNodeEvents method here: C:\Users\y.kunitskaya\Desktop\AQA_Cypress\AQA_Cypress\cypress.config.js
https://on.cypress.io/api/task
Because this error occurred during a `after all` hook we are skipping all of the remaining tests.
